lead_paragraph: Area 1 Security heads off cyberattacks by tapping into servers known to be compromised by hackers, and monitoring the attackers’ activities.

headline.print_headline: To Head Off Digital Attacks, a Security Start-Up Is Spying on Hackers
headline.main: A Computer Security Start-Up Turns the Tables on Hackers

snippet: Area 1 Security heads off cyberattacks by tapping into servers known to be compromised by hackers, and monitoring the attackers’ activities.
abstract: Start-up Area 1 Security seeks to provide its customers with ability to prevent cyberattacks from occurring in first place, goal industry has largely viewed as unfeasible; company is able to do so because it has monitored hackers' activities on compromised servers, which has given company tools to head off attackers before they breach their targets' security systems.
